mean_en: heavy material (such as rocks or water) that is put on a ship to make it steady or on a balloon to control its height in the air
sentence: Stone ballast is laid under railroad tracks to absorb the pressure on the rails from the train.
sentence_trans: 这些碎石道砟铺在铁轨下面，从而吸收火车经过时对轨道产生的压力。
word_etyma: ball 球，重物+ast表名词 →（使船稳定的）压舱物
